ygData.subject: Re: Spell questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t like it either.  Unless you are fighting blues and greens, this spell will just get you killed. ... I still am missing one half of the page needed
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
> after much research and failures, I finally got Mesmerization.
> I've tried to
> use it a couple times last night but it did not seem to work too
> well. Most
> of the enemies resisted if not all of them. Any comment on this spell? is

I don't like it either. Unless you are fighting blues and greens, this
spell will just get you killed.


> the level 20 color shift better? different?

I still am missing one half of the page needed to make this spell, so I
can't comment on it.


> Also, I've been casting quickness on some tanks in my party and they were
> unable to tell me how good / bad it is...anybody got some feedback on that
> from tanks who pay attention?
> thanks,

Any "tank" should immediately notice the effect of this spell. It *greatly*
improves their attack time. It seems to lower the speed of a weapon by
about 10 delay, which is quit a bit.


Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
